titleStmt.title: A general note of the price of binding all sorts of books agreed on by the book-binders whose names are under-written. As it was presented to the master, wardens, and assistants of the Worshipful Company of Stationers, August the 2d, 1669.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: broadside creased with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
